quest.name: And We Shall Call It Pagos

dialogue.name: RODNEY
dialogue.text: Good news, adventurer! While you were away, Mistress Krile completed her work on the Aethernet relay, allowing us to access another region of the island!

dialogue.name: RODNEY
dialogue.text: I'm told it's quite different from Anemos─far, far colder, on account of a preponderance of ice-aspected aether. Accordingly, the team dubbed it “Pagos.”

dialogue.name: RODNEY
dialogue.text: They've already established a new base camp, and if you'd like to lend a hand with the expedition, you'd be more than welcome.

dialogue.name: RODNEY
dialogue.text: Just say the word and I'll see to the arrangements. I'm sure Mistress Krile will be overjoyed to see you again!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You now have access to the Forbidden Land, Eureka Pagos. Like Anemos, Pagos can be explored in parties of up to eight players, or solo.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To embark on your journey to Pagos, speak with Rodney at Pier #1 in Kugane.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please be advised that all excursions into the Forbidden Land, Eureka Pagos, are item level synced. Gear exceeding an item level of [???] will be adjusted.
